subject: Re: Implementing JUnit AFTER development has started...
msgSnippet: I commonly have several test classes for a single application class. Each time I need a new setUp(), I implement a new class (and periodically look for
messageBody:
I commonly have several test classes for a single application class.
Each time I need a new setUp(), I implement a new class (and
periodically look for simplifying refactorings).

Kent
